name: Queen Smitherman
text: Love howies!!! So much better than the other chain pizza. They have an amazing selection of salads too.

name: Jill Sidden
text: First time I ordered from here. The pizza was delicious. I couldn't believe how good it was. I have to try the chicken wings next. Too bad you are not in Concord I would definitely order delivery but when I want pizza again and in the area Howie's is where I will be getting it from.

name: Nellie Wosu
text: Delicious salads very fresh...good chicken wings made to my specific instructions and prompt courteous service!

name: Crystal Lane
text: Fresh, hot, delicious! We enjoy the crust options. The customer service is excellent!

name: Christiane Hess
text: Crust choices are like no other pizza establishment. Kind and courteous employees. Occasional email coupons are appreciated.

name: Justin Wallace
text: The manager Lance is always supper nice and takes care of his customers

name: David Grinnell
text: Great owner and there food safety is great! Plus chicken bacon ranch pizza! Cant beat it!

name: Sean B.
text: Courteous service and great food delivered to my truck at the nearby rest area. You guys rock!

text:

text: This has to be one of the best pizza places I have ever ordered from. The two gentleman that were working were the most polite and helpful crew I have ever associated with. I will definitely be back in the near future. Thank you guys!

text: Good pizza all the time

name: Michelle Clark
text: Ordered three pizzas. Were very hot and fresh. One stuffed crust one deep dish and one regular crust. All with butter cheese crust. The everything crust is good as well. Friendly helpful staff. Very good pizza!

name: Justin Poythress
text: Its GREAT pizza!! Its not as expensive as other pizza places but the quality of service and pizza you get is definitely comparable. You get to CHOOSE the flavor of crust you want and there's plenty of choices. Service is fast and friendly!!

name: Brian Freeman
text: GREAT PIZZA, GREAT SERVICE, AND GREAT PRICE.  TRIFECTA

name: Graham Harrison
text: Great staff, great pizza, great price!!   Wonderful experience.

text: Very bad online ordering process

name: Actually Death
text: I am Death. And even I recommend this pizza

text: Amazing pizza and great service!

name: Top Titan
text: Clean place and great service but I guess I am just use to mom and pop real Italian made pizza

name: Sleep Inn Concord
text: Hungry Howie's is by far the BEST pizza in town! We recommend them to all of our guests and everyone loves it! The customer service is outstanding from the Owner, Lance and the delivery guys!

name: Becky Plummer
text: My family love Hungry Howie's in Kannapolis. Always got and fresh made. The employees are so nice and polite üíú

text: My daughter enjoyed her pizza here as the staff were very nice upon arrive and explained the menu thoroughly since it was our first time.

name: Love Conquers All
text: Had a bad experience with the incorrect toppings on my pizza and I was given a refund.  I think I'll stick to dominoes though as this was not really worth the trouble.

name: Lynn Chavis
text: First experience bad, did not care at all for the taste; looks will fool you, "their brochure"... Fast food, thats what I call it, what a waste of money !

name: JJ cool J j
text: Subs are the best and there pizza is great to also there new chocolate chip cookie is better than pizza hut. There cinnamon bread is great to staff is friendly also would write more but gotta go eat the rest of my sub.  Update:  Haven't ‚Ä¶More

name: Paula VanGundy
text: Ordered using website and it said delivery would be 40 mins. 1.5 hours later we didn't receive pizza. Called and waited 25 mins to get a person. Once we did get someone they said that the pizza had yet to be picked up by delivery driver. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Natasha Whipple
text: A $5 delivery fee.....and then drivers need a tip. .... ummmm nope. We were so looking forward to trying the new guy in town.  Dominoes delivers for free in my neighborhood. Pizza Hut is $3. Papa John's isn't much more. Sorry, not THAT hungry, Howie.

name: Barry Dorval
text: Great food. Great price.

name: Elizabeth Barnes
text: I'm so happy they are in kannapolis I ate pizza here as a kid and it's still delicious

name: Sarah Costello
text: This pizza place is originally from Michigan my home state. So I already knew it was delicious. The pizza and the subs are so good!!!

name: George Steiner
text: OK, saw the advertising for Hungry Howie's Pizza and since Friday is our normal pizza lunch day, decided to try them. Normally we're a Papa John's fan so that's what I'll be comparing it to. We ordered the large thin crust with the works ‚Ä¶More

name: Curtis Ballard
text:
Pizza is the best in town but severely over priced.
16.00 for a medium ? Don‚Äôt think you‚Äôll make it with Dominos down the street offering a large 3 topping for 7.99. Employees are very courteous.

name: Mandy Mcdowell
text: It's always great and the staff is always friendly it's the BEST PIZZA in town I will not go to no other pizza place!!

name: Cayli Breanne
text: Everyone is always, always super friendly and helpful! I came here for their chicken bacon ranch pizza and have been a customer since. I‚Äôd always recommend Hungry Howies in Kannapolis for their pizza, but also their other menu options; I‚Äôve yet to be disappointed when I decide to try something new.

name: Rodney Hicks
text: Me and a friend came by to try it out....1 word..outstanding!! Great everything..even give u 2 toppings and ur choice of crust...were  others give u 1 topping for the same price..cheese or pepperoni..yall got me

name: Kevin Banther
text: Lance is by one of the best person we have come across!  Best pizza in our area and great service!

name: Marshall Merritt
text: Excellent pizza!  Got the special with the cajun crust and it was great.  Will definately go back!  Good to have Hungry Howie's in the area finally.

text: Good pizza and good first time deal
